sentences.sentence: The tendency of the complexing agent to self—esterify is one of the important Influences.
sentences.translation: 络合剂自身的化学稳定性也是重要的影响因素之一。

sentences.sentence: The effect of reaction timcxreaction temperaturexpH and citrate concentration on the esterify process were discussed.
sentences.translation: 考察了催化剂用量、原料配比、反应时间对酯化反应的影响。
